thread.title: Turned us away at the door with reservation
thread.title_full: Turned us away at the door with reservation - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Bobbi S
title: Turned us away at the door with reservation
text: We set this reservation through priceline, said double room. We showed up with our 3 children and said we couldn't stay OR refund our money. We realized it would likely be too small and tried canceling 3 times prior to arrival and they refused. This is unacceptable!
